verses.text: \w In|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* mean time \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* upon all \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* corn, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w sons|strong="H0001"\w*: \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w*.

Juda \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w declared|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* attestation \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* oath, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w unless|strong="H1115"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* bring \w your|strong="H7200"\w* youngest \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w therefore|strong="H7971"\w* thou wilt \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w us|strong="H7971"\w*, \w we|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w together|strong="H0854"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* necessaries \w for|strong="H7971"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* often \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w declared|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* youngest \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5046"\w*: \w You|strong="H5046"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* done \w this|strong="H5046"\w* \w for|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* misery \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w also|strong="H5750"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H0559"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w lived|strong="H2416"\w*: \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H0001"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* regularly, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w demanded|strong="H7592"\w*: \w could|strong="H0376"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Bring|strong="H3381"\w* hither \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* Juda \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w forward|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: lest \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w our|strong="H0854"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w* perish.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* boy \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w require|strong="H1245"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w unless|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* restore \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w for|strong="H0413"\w* ever.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w delay|strong="H4102"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w been|strong="H6258"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H6258"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* second \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0645"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w must|strong="H0518"\w* needs \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w*: \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w best|strong="H2173"\w* fruits \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w balm|strong="H6875"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* storax, \w myrrh|strong="H3910"\w*, turpentine, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w almonds|strong="H8247"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w carry|strong="H3947"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* found \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w*, lest \w perhaps|strong="H0194"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w done|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w mistake|strong="H4870"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* favourable \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*; \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* back \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* keepeth, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* desolate without \w children|strong="H7921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w steward|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* kill victims, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w feast|strong="H0398"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* being \w much|strong="H1697"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H8462"\w* \w time|strong="H8462"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w*, \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w*: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* false accusation, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* violence \w make|strong="H7725"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* asses.

Wherefore going \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w steward|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*,

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Sir|strong="H0113"\w*, we desire thee \w to|strong="H0559"\w* hear \w us|strong="H3381"\w*: We \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w once|strong="H3381"\w* \w before|strong="H8462"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* bought, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* inn, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* found \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w*: which \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* we \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* besides, \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w what|strong="H4310"\w* we want: we \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H3045"\w* bags.

\w But|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w treasure|strong="H4301"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w sacks|strong="H0572"\w*. \w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, which \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* good. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* having \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* fetched \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* provender \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* asses.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*, \w against|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w at|strong="H0398"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* offered \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w* holding \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* face \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.
